IT Department

IT SECURITY AUDIT NOTIFICATION
-------------------------------

Hello Team Member,

Our regular security audits have identified a suspicious email (email_001) in your inbox which we believe could contain potentially unsafe content. Please refrain from opening the message or clicking on any links within it until further notice. We are currently investigating the situation and will provide updates shortly. 

In the meantime, help us by following these steps:

1. Report the email to IT immediately (instructions below).
2. Delete the email from your inbox to minimize potential risks.

To report this email, please follow these instructions:

a. Open the suspicious email.
b. Forward the email to it_support@yourcompany.com with the subject "Security Audit - Suspicious Email."
c. Please provide your contact information in the body of the forwarded email so we can reach out if needed.

Once you've completed these steps, please proceed to step 3: Delete the email from your inbox by selecting it and clicking on "Delete" or "Trash."

Thank you for your cooperation during this security audit.
